verses.text: \w There|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Cæsarea|strong="G2542"\w* \w called|strong="G3686"\w* \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w*, a \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w band|strong="G4686"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* the \w Italian|strong="G2483"\w* \add band\add*,

\add A\add* \w devout|strong="G2152"\w* \add man\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* one that \w feared|strong="G5399"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w which|strong="G5037"\w* \w gave|strong="G4160"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w alms|strong="G1654"\w* to the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayed|strong="G1189"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w alway|strong="G1275"\w*.

He \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w vision|strong="G3705"\w* \w evidently|strong="G5320"\w* \w about|strong="G5616"\w* the \w ninth|strong="G1766"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* of the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* an \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* coming \w in|strong="G1525"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w saying|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when he \w looked|strong="G0816"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w afraid|strong="G1719"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* is \w it|strong="G2076"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w alms|strong="G1654"\w* are come \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* a \w memorial|strong="G3422"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w send|strong="G3992"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Joppa|strong="G2445"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* call \w for|strong="G3343"\w* \add one\add* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* surname \w is|strong="G1941"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*:

\w He|strong="G3778"\w* \w lodgeth|strong="G3579"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* a \w tanner|strong="G1038"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w by|strong="G3844"\w* the sea \w side|strong="G2281"\w*: \w he|strong="G3778"\w* shall \w tell|strong="G2980"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w thou|strong="G4571"\w* \w oughtest|strong="G1163"\w* to \w do|strong="G4160"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w* was \w departed|strong="G0565"\w*, he \w called|strong="G5455"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* household \w servants|strong="G3610"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w devout|strong="G2152"\w* \w soldier|strong="G4757"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w waited|strong="G4342"\w* on \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w continually|strong="G4342"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w declared|strong="G1834"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* \add these\add* \w things|strong="G0537"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Joppa|strong="G2445"\w*.

¶ \w On|strong="G1161"\w* the \w morrow|strong="G1887"\w*, \w as|strong="G1565"\w* they went on their \w journey|strong="G3596"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* drew \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w* unto the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w housetop|strong="G1430"\w* to \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* the \w sixth|strong="G1623"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w became|strong="G1096"\w* very \w hungry|strong="G4361"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* have \w eaten|strong="G1089"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* while \w they|strong="G1565"\w* made \w ready|strong="G3903"\w*, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w fell|strong="G1968"\w* \w into|strong="G1909"\w* a \w trance|strong="G1611"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G2334"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w vessel|strong="G4632"\w* \w descending|strong="G2597"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* it had been a \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w sheet|strong="G3607"\w* \w knit|strong="G1210"\w* at the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w corners|strong="G0746"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* let \w down|strong="G2524"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*:

\w Wherein|strong="G3739"\w* \w were|strong="G5225"\w* all manner \w of|strong="G3956"\w* fourfooted \w beasts|strong="G5074"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* wild \w beasts|strong="G2342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* creeping \w things|strong="G2062"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fowls|strong="G4071"\w* of the \w air|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w came|strong="G1096"\w* a \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Rise|strong="G0450"\w*, \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*; \w kill|strong="G2380"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w eat|strong="G5315"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, Not \w so|strong="G3365"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* I \w have|strong="G5315"\w* \w never|strong="G3763"\w* \w eaten|strong="G5315"\w* any \w thing|strong="G3956"\w* that is \w common|strong="G2839"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \add spake\add* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* the second \w time|strong="G1208"\w*, \w What|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w cleansed|strong="G2511"\w*, \add that\add* \w call|strong="G2840"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w common|strong="G2840"\w*.

\w This|strong="G5124"\w* was \w done|strong="G1096"\w* \w thrice|strong="G5151"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w vessel|strong="G4632"\w* was received \w up|strong="G0353"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w while|strong="G5613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w doubted|strong="G1280"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* this \w vision|strong="G3705"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he had \w seen|strong="G1492"\w* should \w mean|strong="G1498"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w* had made \w enquiry|strong="G1331"\w* for \w Simon’s|strong="G4613"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w stood|strong="G2186"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* the \w gate|strong="G4440"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G5455"\w*, and \w asked|strong="G4441"\w* \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was \w surnamed|strong="G1941"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, were \w lodged|strong="G3579"\w* \w there|strong="G1759"\w*.

¶ \w While|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w thought|strong="G1760"\w* \w on|strong="G4012"\w* the \w vision|strong="G3705"\w*, the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* said \w unto|strong="G2036"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*.

\w Arise|strong="G0450"\w* \w therefore|strong="G0235"\w*, and get thee \w down|strong="G2597"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w doubting|strong="G1252"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*: \w for|strong="G1360"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* have \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* went \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w*; and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* he \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w seek|strong="G2212"\w*: \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* the \w cause|strong="G0156"\w* \w wherefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w ye|strong="G3739"\w* are \w come|strong="G3918"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w* the \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w*, a \w just|strong="G1342"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* one that \w feareth|strong="G5399"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* of good \w report|strong="G3140"\w* \w among|strong="G5259"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, was warned from \w God|strong="G5537"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* an \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* to send \w for|strong="G3343"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* called \w he|strong="G1528"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1528"\w*, and \w lodged|strong="G3579"\w* \add them\add*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* on the \w morrow|strong="G1887"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* went \w away|strong="G1831"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Joppa|strong="G2445"\w* \w accompanied|strong="G4905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the morrow \w after|strong="G1887"\w* they \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Cæsarea|strong="G2542"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w* waited \w for|strong="G4328"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w had|strong="G2258"\w* called \w together|strong="G4779"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w kinsmen|strong="G4773"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w near|strong="G0316"\w* \w friends|strong="G5384"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* coming \w in|strong="G1525"\w*, \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w* \w met|strong="G4876"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, and fell \w down|strong="G4098"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* his \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \add him\add*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w took|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Stand \w up|strong="G0450"\w*; \w I|strong="G2504"\w* \w myself|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2504"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* as he talked \w with|strong="G4926"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, he went \w in|strong="G1525"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* that were come \w together|strong="G4905"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* he \w said|strong="G5346"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w know|strong="G1987"\w* how \w that|strong="G5613"\w* it is an unlawful \w thing|strong="G0111"\w* for a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* that \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* to keep \w company|strong="G2853"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* come \w unto|strong="G4334"\w* one of another \w nation|strong="G0246"\w*; \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w shewed|strong="G1166"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w* \w that|strong="G1166"\w* I \w should|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w call|strong="G3004"\w* any \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w common|strong="G2839"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1352"\w* came \w I|strong="G2064"\w* \add unto you\add* without \w gainsaying|strong="G0369"\w*, as soon as I was sent \w for|strong="G3343"\w*: I \w ask|strong="G4441"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* for \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w intent|strong="G3056"\w* ye have sent \w for|strong="G3343"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \w Four|strong="G5067"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w ago|strong="G0575"\w* I \w was|strong="G2252"\w* \w fasting|strong="G3522"\w* \w until|strong="G3360"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* at the \w ninth|strong="G1766"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* I \w prayed|strong="G4336"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w me|strong="G3450"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w bright|strong="G2986"\w* \w clothing|strong="G2066"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \w Cornelius|strong="G2883"\w*, \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w* is \w heard|strong="G1522"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w alms|strong="G1654"\w* are had in \w remembrance|strong="G3415"\w* in the sight \w of|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Send|strong="G3992"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Joppa|strong="G2445"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* call \w hither|strong="G3333"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* surname \w is|strong="G1941"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*; \w he|strong="G3778"\w* is \w lodged|strong="G3579"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w house|strong="G3614"\w* \w of|strong="G4613"\w* \add one\add* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* a \w tanner|strong="G1038"\w* \w by|strong="G3844"\w* the sea \w side|strong="G2281"\w*: \w who|strong="G3739"\w*, when he \w cometh|strong="G3854"\w*, shall \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*.

\w Immediately|strong="G1824"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* I \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w hast|strong="G4160"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w* that thou art \w come|strong="G3854"\w*. \w Now|strong="G3568"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* are \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* here \w present|strong="G3918"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, to \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* are \w commanded|strong="G4367"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \add his\add* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Of|strong="G1909"\w* a \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* I \w perceive|strong="G2638"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* respecter of \w persons|strong="G4381"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w feareth|strong="G5399"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worketh|strong="G2038"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w accepted|strong="G1184"\w* with \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

The \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \add God\add* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* unto the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*, \w preaching|strong="G2097"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*: (\w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w*:)

That \w word|strong="G4487"\w*, \add I say\add*, \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w*, which was \w published|strong="G1096"\w* \w throughout|strong="G2596"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w*, and \w began|strong="G0756"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w after|strong="G3326"\w* the \w baptism|strong="G0908"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w preached|strong="G2784"\w*;

\w How|strong="G5613"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w anointed|strong="G5548"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3478"\w* with the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* with \w power|strong="G1411"\w*: \w who|strong="G3739"\w* went \w about|strong="G1330"\w* doing \w good|strong="G2109"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w healing|strong="G2390"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* were \w oppressed|strong="G2616"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w* of all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w land|strong="G5561"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*; \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they \w slew|strong="G0337"\w* and \w hanged|strong="G2910"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* a \w tree|strong="G3586"\w*:
